attributes.action: Rename Wootton Bassett, Royal Wootton Bassett in recognition of the town's role in welcoming home the war dead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been extremely touched to see the public display of affection from the townfolk of Wootton Bassett each time a war hero returns to the UK. It is for this reason that I would like to see Wootton Bassett renamed Royal Wootton Bassett.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
